Articles.Content:
Hi there!

I would like to request a mod/plugin/whatever that automatically takes screenshots of your craft when certain parameters are met.

For example, if you pass 20m above the ground with a vertical velocity exceeding 30ms, there is about to be a big crash, and that would make a good screenshot.

Or the first time your craft passes into the sun on its first orbit, or the first time you land on a body in a save, etc etc.

Basically, any noteworthy occurance automatically takes a standard Press-F1 screenshot in the normal folder.

Perhaps have some options to disallow certain triggers. What do people think?

I was looking for this same thing.

anybody have anything available?
This doesn't sound too difficult to do, as it would just bind the screenshot key to what is essentially a set of contract parameters.
